title: [Health] A new study from France shows that children’s eye injuries due to alcohol-based hand sanitizer have increased 700% since the beginning of the COVID-19 pandemic; the main reason is eye-level dispensers in public places

[Environment] 'Greener’ COVID-19 recovery plans are needed to reach the Paris Agreement’s temperature goals. Even if the growing list of countries committing to 2050 net-zero emissions targets reached their goals, we would still deplete the 1.5C remaining carbon budget more than a decade too soon.
